dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare trespass in the domain of shadows? Your presence is a blight upon the darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking power, Shadow Wraith. Aid me, and you shall be rewarded.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Aid? Rewards? Hah! What could a miserable creature like you possibly offer to one such as me?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I possess dark artifacts that will augment your strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Artifacts, you say? Show them to me, and perhaps I won't rend your soul apart.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: *Show the artifacts*
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Interesting... You intrigue me, dark one. Perhaps our goals align.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My powers speak louder than any artifact. I could obliterate you if I wished.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Such arrogance! I'll teach you the true meaning of fear!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we can eclipse the light forever. Join me, Noctis.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An intriguing proposition... but can you truly bring eternal darkness?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have already cast shadows over countless lands. The light trembles before me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well, dark one. Let us erase the light together.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Doubt my power and you shall perish in the attempt!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal! You will regret challenging me!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your strength is formidable, but even you cannot withstand my wrath.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Empty threats will not save you. Prepare for annihilation!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then let us battle, and the stronger shall prevail.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it! Only the strong deserve to survive!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no need to waste my time on you, wraith.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Flee, then. You will only delay your inevitable demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your existence is an abomination. I shall rid the Darkened Veil of your presence!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, but futile against the eternality of shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'll let my actions speak. En garde!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Prepare to be consumed by the void!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: To the death, shadow wraith!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Yes, fight! Embrace the end!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I relish this battle! Let's see who stands victorious.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your victory will be short-lived!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your shadows can’t protect you from my magic.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Magic, you say? Foolish mortal, you do not understand true power!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I wield a power far greater than yours, wraith.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogant fool! Meet your end!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Show me what you have, and let's see who prevails.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish! Prepare for annihilation!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I could destroy you now, but I choose to spare you. Leave, and never return.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You spare me? How quaint. I think not.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then face my wrath!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your wrath means nothing! Attack!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, cower in the shadows, wraith.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Know this: the shadows are eternal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The darkness calls to me, and I answer. Let us work together, Noctis.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You dare invoke the darkness before a being of shadow? Prove your worth!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am Zarathos, Shadow Conqueror, and I demand respect!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect is earned, not demanded. Show me your power, then we shall see.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: *Demonstrate power*
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impressive... You may prove to be a valuable ally.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You shall see my power first-hand in battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it! Face the wraith's wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Is it proof you seek, or a companion in your eternal twilight?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Companion? Such trivialities are fleeting. Show your worth!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, a demonstration it is.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You may entertain me. Proceed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Enough talk! Prepare for battle, shadow!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your bravado will be your undoing!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we can create an empire of darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An empire, you say? Can you truly offer such an alliance?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have conquered many and will conquer more. Join me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your ambition impresses me. Let us proceed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My offer is sincere. Reject it at your peril.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then I will test your resolve. Prepare!
